title: Righty Zeity; Lefty Trendy 5/6: Rihanna, Goodwill, Lin Manuel-Miranda, 9/11, Mike Pompeo, I Think You Should Leave
itunes:title: Righty Zeity; Lefty Trendy 5/6: Rihanna, Goodwill, Lin Manuel-Miranda, 9/11, Mike Pompeo, I Think You Should Leave
description:
In this edition of Righty Zeity; Lefty Trendy, Jack and Miles discuss Rihanna/A$AP Rocky trolling their fans, Goodwill selling an ancient Roman relic, Lin Manuel-Miranda "honoring the queen", Saudis directly tied to 9/11 in declassified documents, Mike Pompeo shading Dr. Oz, and Netflix doing the right thing and greenlighting season 3 of 'I Think You Should Leave'!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
